emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 kg hakket oksekød' directly matches 'oksekød, hakket, 15-20% fedt' and 'oksekød, hakket, 5-10% fedt' and 'oksekød, hakket, 10-15% fedt'. According to rule 5, when multiple viable options have similar processing levels, the one with the highest emission factor should be chosen. 'oksekød, hakket, 5-10% fedt' has the highest emission factor of 50.6 kg CO2e / kg.
The ingredient '3 store løg' is a direct match to 'løg'. This aligns with rule 4, which prioritizes the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.
